verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñira līlā-ananta, apāra
'sahasra-vadana' yāra nāhi pāya pāra

synonyms: caitanya-gosāñira—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; līlā—the pastimes; ananta—unlimited; apāra—without end; sahasra-vadana—Lord Śeṣa, who has thousands of hoods; yāra—of which; nāhi—not; pāya—gets; pāra—the limit.
translation: The pastimes of Lord Caitanya are unlimited and endless. Even Sahasravadana, Lord Śeṣa, cannot reach the limits of His pastimes.
